headline: Good for entry level
pros: people are very nice and friendly

headline: Not rewarding enough for the time I have put in
pros: Resume builder, flexible about time off.
cons: You need to ask questions or else no one will explain you anything. Pretty basic portfolio which didn't even convince me.

headline: Great opportunity to learn and grow with thriving firm
pros: The company values are strong and notable. Also, the firm has the opportunity to market itself well overtime to develop an affluent and dependable clientele. Management cares a lot about employee satisfaction.
cons: Sometimes lack of work available and slow times. Promotions are somewhat arbitrary.
